sentence.text: Our previous studies reported gastric cancer cells are insensitive to positive regulation of apoptotic process.
However, whether β-elemene could enhance anti-cancer effects of positive regulation of apoptotic process on gastric cancer cells is unknown.

In our present study, β-elemene prevented gastric cancer cell viability in dose-dependent manner, and when combined with positive regulation of apoptotic process, obviously inhibited proliferation and promoted apoptosis in gastric cancer cells.
Our results suggest that β-elemene increases the sensitivity of gastric cancer cells to positive regulation of apoptotic process partially by promoting the formation of DISC in lipid rafts
